Package player

Class Actor

  • java.lang.Object
    • player.Actor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ControlPointActor
    public class Actor
extends java.lang.Object
    The class Actor implements the status of the player in the game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Actor​(GameMap map, DamageableUID pawnId, boolean firstPlayer)
      This constructor gets the GameMap and the Pawn, and build the Actor

      Called when FF phase is starting If possible it flips the board and changes the action that can be performed
      void damage​(Actor shooter, int numOfDmg)
      Damages the player, and applies all the Marks that can be applied, triggers tagback on next check

      Damages the player without applying the Marks nor triggering the tagback Also used to apply the damage

    • Constructor Detail

      • Actor

        public Actor​(GameMap map,
             DamageableUID pawnId,
             boolean firstPlayer)
        This constructor gets the GameMap and the Pawn, and build the Actor
        Parameters:
        map - GameMap
        pawnId - the Pawn identifier that has to be associated with this Actor
        firstPlayer - True if the Actor is the first player in the game

      • pawn

        public Pawn pawn()
        Provides a faster way to get the Pawn object given the identifier
        Returns:
        The pawn

      • move

        public void move​(TileUID tile)
        This method implements the basic action of movement It modifies the tile of the Pawn and move the Player in the GameMap
        Parameters:
        tile - the tile where the Pawn must be put

      • discardPowerUp

        public void discardPowerUp​(PowerUp powerUp)
        This method discards a powerUp without checking if the player own the card
        Parameters:
        powerUp - the powerUp that need to be discarded

      • drawPowerUpRaw

        public void drawPowerUpRaw​(int num)
        This metohd picks up a certain amount of power Ups, without check of validity
        Parameters:
        num - the number of powerUp

      • pickUp

        public void pickUp​(AmmoCard card)
        Checks if in the player's tile there is the grabbable item. Picks up the weapon or the ammoTile, adds all the necessary ammo and powerUps
        Parameters:
        card - is the ammoCard element that the player want to pick up

      • pickUp

        public void pickUp​(Weapon weapon,
                   java.util.Optional<Weapon> weaponToDiscard)
        Checks if in the player's tile there is the weapon. Check if weapons' inventory is full. Checks if the weapon chosen to be discarded is a valid weapon. Picks up the weapon and discard all the weapon and powerUps
        Parameters:
        weapon - is the weapon that the player want to pick up
        weaponToDiscard - contains the weapon that must be discarded. If there is no need to discard weapons, this field is left unchecked

      • reloadWeapon

        public void reloadWeapon​(Weapon weapon)
        Check if the weapon is owned by the player, if the player owns enough ammo and then reloads the weapon.
        Parameters:
        weapon - is the weapon to be reloaded.

      • useWeapon

        public void useWeapon​(Weapon weapon)
        Once a weapon is used, it is removed from the loadedSet and added to the unloadedSet
        Parameters:
        weapon - the weapon that has been used

      • pay

        public void pay​(PowerUp p)
        Check if the powerup is owned by the player and discard it
        Parameters:
        p - the powerup

      • pay

        public void pay​(AmmoAmount amount)
        Pay the given amount using the ammocubes
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount to be paid

      • getPoints

        public int getPoints()
        Returns:
        the points actually owned by the player.

      • damageRaw

        public void damageRaw​(Actor shooter,
                      int numOfDmg)
        Damages the player without applying the Marks nor triggering the tagback Also used to apply the damage
        Parameters:
        shooter - the attacker
        numOfDmg - number of damage points

      • damage

        public void damage​(Actor shooter,
                   int numOfDmg)
        Damages the player, and applies all the Marks that can be applied, triggers tagback on next check
        Parameters:
        shooter - the attacker
        numOfDmg - number of damage points

        Returns:
        the damage taken from a single shot.

        public void addPoints​(int p)
        Parameters:
        p - is the number of points to be added to the player current points.

      • getAmmo

      • getNumOfDeaths

        public int getNumOfDeaths()
        Returns:
        the number of deaths in order to know how many points will get the player that will shoot next time.

        Returns:

      • isDead

        public boolean isDead()
        Returns:
        True iif the player is dead

      • addMark

        public int addMark​(Actor attackerActor,
                   int numOfMarks)
        Adds a certain number of marks from pawn to this. If the pawn already assigned 3 marks nothing happens.
        Parameters:
        attackerActor - The attacker
        numOfMarks - the number of marks to apply
        Returns:
        the number of marks successfully applied

      • numOfMarksApplied

        public int numOfMarksApplied()
        Returns:
        how many marks this Actor applied to other Actors

      • respawn

        public void respawn​(PowerUp powerUp)
        This function resets the player after a death, the spawn location has been already determined and is handled by the calling process

      • pawnID

        public DamageableUID pawnID()
        Returns:
        the ID of the pawn associated with the actor

      • getLoadedWeapon

        public java.util.Collection<Weapon> getLoadedWeapon()
        Returns:
        A collection containing all the Loaded Weapons held by the player

        public void setLastInFrenzy()

      • isLastInFrenzy

        public boolean isLastInFrenzy()

      • beginFF

        public void beginFF​(boolean afterFirst)
        Called when FF phase is starting If possible it flips the board and changes the action that can be performed
        Parameters:
        afterFirst - True iif the player is between the first player and the player who started FF

      • endTurn

        public boolean endTurn​(Actor player,
                       Scoreboard scoreboard)
        Manages the end of the turn. If the player is not dead nothing happens. Otherwise the kill and the score are added to the scoreboard and damage are cleared. If the player is dead and FF has started then flips the board
        Parameters:
        player - The player that finished the turn
        scoreboard - Scoreboard
        Returns:
        True iif the player needs to respawn
